titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Rules and Administration.

action.text: Committee on Rules and Administration. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Schumer. Without written report.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in Senate

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 17.

term.name: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration

bill.summary: 2/26/2013--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Rules and Administration for March 1, 2013, through September 30, 2013.
